title: P0: Extract GitHub URLs from Slack messages in fetchers
P1: Add semantic similarity scoring to correlator
Integration test: Verify 80%+ confidence on Next.js 16.1 cluster
Fix Notion fetcher product filtering for timeline correlation
description:
Found during timeline correlation integration test (cell-j64c8i-mk318pedtrm).

**Problem**: fetchNotionEvents() doesn't filter by product parameter before adding events to results. Product inference happens correctly (lines 301-321 in fetchers.ts), but no filter is applied before pushing to the results array. The global limit in fetchAllEvents() gets filled with mixed-product events.

**Impact**: Timeline correlation confidence stuck at 58% instead of target 80%+ because only 1 Next.js Notion event made it into the 100-event sample.

**Fix**: Add product filtering after inference in fetchNotionEvents():
```typescript
// After product inference
if (options.product && event.product !== options.product) continue;
```

**Reference**: docs/timeline-integration-test-results.md

title: Frontend Performance: Cache TTL + Error Fixes
description: Fix egghead-next's 80% cache miss rate and 166 errors/2h. Three independent fixes tracked in migrate-egghead#21. Branch: fix/frontend-cache-perf

title: Bump cache TTL on course and lesson pages
description: Change s-maxage=1 to s-maxage=300, stale-while-revalidate=3600 on /courses/[course]/index.tsx and /lessons/[slug].tsx. Add private,no-store for draft course path. Kills ~9,000 cold lambda invocations per 2h.

title: Fix /api/cio-subscriber error handling
description: Add optional chaining to error.response?.status. Add try/catch around PUT to tracking API. Add .catch() to unguarded GET attributes call. Kills 102 errors/2h (~1,200/day).

title: Add staleTime to tRPC React Query config
description: Add staleTime: 60_000 to default React Query options in tRPC client config. Deduplicates 6 identical feature flag queries per page load, cutting 46% of tRPC volume.

title: Logging overhaul: high-cardinality structured logs + frontend debug logging
description:
egghead-next needs a comprehensive logging strategy:

**Server-side (high-cardinality structured JSON):**
- tRPC middleware logging ✅ (done in fix/frontend-cache-perf)
- API route logging (pages/api/*) — every route should emit structured JSON with path, duration_ms, status, user context
- getServerSideProps logging — page render timing, cache header emitted, data source latency
- Error boundaries — structured error reports with component stack

**Frontend (agent-browser consumable):**
- Replace console.log spray with structured debug events
- window.__DEBUG_LOG array or custom event dispatch for agent-browser to consume
- Feature flag state on window for quick inspection
- Client-side error boundary that emits structured errors

**Why:** Currently debugging requires Axiom queries + guesswork. Structured logs let us use `vercel logs --json | jq` for real-time debugging and agent-browser console inspection for frontend state. The tRPC middleware is the template — extend the pattern to all server paths.

title: Full structured logging overhaul for egghead-next
description: High-cardinality structured JSON logs for all server-side paths, frontend debug logging for agent-browser, error boundary instrumentation. 6 subtasks, 75 files.

title: Create shared logging utilities (src/lib/logging.ts)

title: Instrument 37 getServerSideProps pages
